item.title: Making Do With a Bargain Bin Bandsaw
item.description: I’ve always wanted a bandsaw. Being able to cut wood, plastics, etc. quickly and with flexibility has been a dream in my home shop. When I found an ad on Craigslist for a portable bandsaw for $50, I just couldn’t resist. The main caveat was that it was missing a table, but that wasn’t a big enough issue to turn me away from this killer deal. Fresh off Craigslist in its table-naked glory.
